title: New Year's Eve Makeup
description: New Year's Eve Makeup is a beauty makeup game where you help three best friends dazzle for their big night. Craft Ellie’s cinnamon roll glam, Regina’s golden glow, and Kali’s icy gem look using a variety of makeup, accessories, and hairstyles. Finish their transformation with stunning outfits, creating unforgettable party-ready styles for the ultimate New Year celebration!
